sentences.en: a new approach to teaching languages
sentences.cn: 新的语言教学法

sentences.en: As I approached the house, I noticed a light on upstairs.
sentences.cn: 我走近那幢房子的时候注意到楼上有灯光。

sentences.en: At their approach the little boy ran away and hid.
sentences.cn: 他们一走近，小男孩就逃走藏了起来。

sentences.en: At their approach the little boy scurried away and hid.
sentences.cn: 他们走近时，小男孩急忙跑开藏了起来。

sentences.en: Dr. Mesibov set forth the basis of his approach to teaching students.
sentences.cn: 梅西伯夫博士阐述了他的教学方法的基础。

sentences.en: Haig was limited by his blinkered approach to strategy and tactics.
sentences.cn: 海格被自己那一套保守的战略战术所束缚。

sentences.en: He decided to adopt a different approach and teach the Bible through story-telling.
sentences.cn: 他决定采用一种不同的方法，通过讲故事来教授《圣经》。

sentences.en: He is still bickering with the control tower over admissible approach routes.
sentences.cn: 他还在为可采用的进近航线与指挥塔台争执不下。

sentences.en: I have to change my approach, the competition is too good now.
sentences.cn: 我得改变方法，现在的竞争对手太强。

sentences.en: It's here that we come up against the difference of approach.
sentences.cn: 我们就是在这一点上面临方法上的分歧。

sentences.en: Nervous politicians might well feel more comfortable with a step-by-step approach.
sentences.cn: 神经脆弱的政治家们似乎更容易接受一种循序渐进的做法。

sentences.en: organizations which take a positive approach to creative thinking
sentences.cn: 对创造性思维采取积极态度的组织

sentences.en: Our approach frightened the birds.
sentences.cn: 我们的靠近吓了那些鸟。

sentences.en: She heard footsteps approaching.
sentences.cn: 她听到有脚步声走过来。

sentences.en: The elephants trumpeted and stamped their feet at their approach.
sentences.cn: 当他们靠近时，大象又吼又跺脚。

sentences.en: The path serves as an approach to the boat house.
sentences.cn: 这条小路通往船屋。

sentences.en: The traffic on the approach road slowed to a crawl.
sentences.cn: 引路上车辆行驶缓慢。

sentences.en: There is a great deal to learn from Hal's expert approach.
sentences.cn: 从哈尔熟练的方法中可以学到很多。

sentences.en: They advocated a scattergun approach of posting dozens of letters.
sentences.cn: 他们主张采取向四处随意邮寄大量信件的方式。

sentences.en: This book takes an unorthodox approach to art criticism.
sentences.cn: 这本书采用的是非传统的艺术评论方法。

sentences.en: We have a very communicative approach to teaching languages.
sentences.cn: 我们在语言教学中非常强调交际教学法。

sentences.en: We have to develop a less amateurish approach to our organisa-tions.
sentences.cn: 我们必须使我们对待自己组织的态度变得较为专业。
